backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing site settings and admin-protected CRUD operations for header, footer, and social links.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.html: Main ICP-enabled HTML entry loading React app via main.tsx.
frontend/nonicp.html: Static non-ICP entry loading alternate React bundle.
frontend/public/data/events.v1.json: Static dataset listing events with metadata, dates, and publication info.
frontend/public/data/impact-stories.v1.j: Static dataset of published impact stories with text and optional images.
frontend/public/data/programs.v1.json: Static dataset of program definitions with objectives, outcomes, and categories.
frontend/public/data/team.v1.json: Static dataset of team members with roles, bios, and visibility order.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and global error boundary configuring public, admin, and control routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Controls admin panel access with authentication and admin checks, rendering navigation and fallback states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/AuthModal.tsx: Provides a login/signup modal with form validation, loading states, and mode switching logic.
frontend/src/components/control/ControlL: Admin control panel layout that handles auth checks, redirects, access control, and renders navigation and content.
frontend/src/components/control/Standalo: Standalone control panel layout that verifies Internet Identity login, shows loading/auth prompts, and renders menu and routed content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer using backend site settings with fallbacks, including links, social icons, and branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the responsive site header with navigation, dynamic styling on scroll, and an authentication modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app in a layout with header, footer, suspense loading, and custom error boundaries for safe rendering.
frontend/src/ControlApp.tsx: Standalone control panel router defining routes for site settings and content management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Determines whether the current authenticated user has admin privileges by querying their role from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides admin CRUD hooks for programs and other entities using the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRoleManagemen: Exposes mutations for managing admin roles via email registration, association, and granting admin rights.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching programs, team members, impact stories, and events via an actor API with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Implements React Query hooks to fetch and mutate site settings, including header, footer, and social links with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes using a luminous pastel palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/nonicp/App.jsx: Sets up a non-ICP app with routing, authentication context, theming, and query client configuration.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/AuthProvider.js: Provides authentication state and methods using a local storage–backed auth store.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/authStore.js: Implements a localStorage-backed auth system for user registration, login, session restoration, and logout.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/RequireAuth.jsx: Protects routes by checking authentication and redirecting unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/nonicp/auth/useAuth.js: Exports a hook that retrieves authentication context and enforces usage within AuthProvider.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpFoo: A footer component displaying logo, description, social media icons, and navigation links.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpHea: A responsive header with dynamic scroll behavior, navigation links, authentication menu, and mobile drawer.
frontend/src/nonicp/components/NonIcpLay: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/staticDataClien: Utility for fetching and caching static JSON data like programs, events, team members, and impact stories.
frontend/src/nonicp/data/submissionsStor: LocalStorage-based store for saving and retrieving donation and contact form submissions.
frontend/src/nonicp/main.jsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with global styles.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/AboutPage.jsx: Displays mission, values, team members, and impact stories with animated sections and fetched data.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ContactPage.js: Contact page with organization details, social links, and a form that saves submissions to localStorage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/DonatePage.jsx: Donation page offering preset or custom amounts and saving contributions to localStorage.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/EventsPage.jsx: Loads events, filters and sorts them by status and date, and displays them with a gradient-styled layout and loading state.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/GalleryPage.js: Displays a filterable gallery of images with scroll-triggered animations and modal image previews.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/HomePage.jsx: Renders the homepage with feature sections, parallax hero and impact images, and scroll-based animations.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/LoginPage.jsx: Provides a login form with validation, error handling, and redirect logic for authenticated users.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/NotFoundPage.j: Simple 404 page offering a message and a button to return home.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/ProgramsPage.j: Fetches and displays educational programs with category filtering, tabs, and scroll animations.
Protected page showing authenticated user profile details and options to sign out or navigate home.
frontend/src/nonicp/pages/SignupPage.jsx: Signup form handling validation, account creation, and redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying mission, values, and dynamic impact stories and team data with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContacts.t: Admin page for viewing, marking, and deleting contact form submissions with stats, tables, dialogs, and mutations.
Admin dashboard displaying stats, contact messages, and a form to grant admin rights by email and principal.
Lists all donations and shows total count, total amount, and average donation with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEvents.tsx: Admin interface to view, add, edit, filter, and delete events including image uploads and status management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminImpactStor: Allows admins to create, edit, publish, and delete impact stories with optional images.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity and email association, redirecting authorized admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPrograms.t: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and deleting programs with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTeam.tsx: Admin page to manage team members, including creation, editing, ordering, visibility, and photo uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with organization info, social links, and a form that submits messages via API with validation and animations.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlDashbo: Dashboard displaying statistics for programs, events, gallery items, team members, and impact stories.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlEvents: Control panel for managing events with add, edit, delete, filtering, image uploads, and status handling.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlGaller: Admin gallery manager allowing item creation, editing, deletion, and image uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlImpact: Admin page for listing, creating, editing, deleting, and searching impact stories with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlProgra: Admin interface to manage programs, including CRUD operations, image upload, and handling objectives and outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlSiteSe: Form-based admin page to edit site-wide settings such as links, slogans, and footer content.
frontend/src/pages/control/ControlTeam.t: Admin panel for adding, editing, and deleting team members, including photo upload and visibility settings.
frontend/src/pages/control/StandaloneCon: Standalone dashboard displaying key statistics and quick navigation cards for admin management.
frontend/src/pages/DonatePage.tsx: Donate page presenting preset donation levels and a form to submit custom donations using API and scroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays events with filtering and sorting, showing a hero section, filter controls, and a card list with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads gallery items, generates dynamic categories, filters images, and renders an animated gallery grid with a modal viewer.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with hero images, feature highlights, stats, and parallax/scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Fetches programs, builds dynamic categories, and displays them in tabbed sections with animations and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Utility functions that normalize authorization-related error messages and detect auth errors.
frontend/STATIC_HOSTING.md: Guide explaining ICP vs static deployment modes and entry points.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, plugin usage, and extensive custom theme extensions for colors, spacing, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a website/admin panel and an in‑progress request to unify header and footer logos using an uploaded image.
